description.en: Lagoon Views is located along the world’s largest man-made crystal lagoon at Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum City - District One, one of Dubai’s most prestigious communities. The extravagant interiors of the homes, sweeping lagoon vistas, unparalleled amenities and excellent connectivity provide a serene lifestyle while being close to the heart of the city. Revel in the joy of living amidst lush greenery and sweeping parklands every day.
